duties_responsibilities.duty: Review design requirements and establish design criteria.
Develop design sketches for arrangement of structures and connection details.
Develop structural calculations by hand or with computer analysis program to demonstrate code compliance.
Develop design reports documenting the suitability of designs against requirements.
Review and check engineering drawings of structures.
Communicate with others on the project team and with the customer's technical personnel.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science degree in Applied Mechanics or Civil Engineering
